## HeadlessConfig.saveToLocalStorage property

Whether to save the instance's [ConversationState](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.conversationstate.md) to local storage. Defaults to true.

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveToLocalStorage?: boolean;
```
